content: You know, my full name actually means "a traveler on the path" in my homeland's language. It might sound unusual, but it's quite easy to remember!
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-1013萨飞里_4-修改NPC昵称

content: But I'm more comfortable calling you Msafiri.

content: {A点头}No problem, whatever you're comfortable with. Whichever name you use, I'll always answer.

content: That's fun! I'd like to call you "Radarear."

content: I just wanted to check what you're comfortable with — would you like to keep calling me <style=Highlight>Radarear</style>, or go back to <style=Highlight>Msafiri</style>?
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-1013萨飞里_4-修改NPC昵称

content: {A歪头}You know, I've been away from home for so long now. Everyone here calls me by my full name, and while I'm used to it, sometimes it still makes me think of my childhood...

NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-1013萨飞里_4-修改NPC昵称

content: My old friends used to say my hearing is so sharp it's like I have extra ears. That's how I got the name <style=Highlight>Radarear</style>. Maybe you could call me that too?
info: NPC事件模板4-修改NPC昵称-1013萨飞里_4-修改NPC昵称

content: After all this time living together, you remind me so much of my friends from the grasslands. Being around you just feels easy and comfortable.

content: {A歪头}Lately, hearing you call me <style=Highlight>Radarear</style> makes me feel like I'm back home — free and boundless, like running wilde across the open grasslands.
